languages.text: {n}Джай нервно облизывает губы — она явно не ожидала такого ответа на свою ремарку.{/n} "Атилиус, не думаю, что Великий особо жаждет, чтобы вы подверглись лоботомии и превратились в безмозглую жестянку лишь потому, что кто-то где-то поменял какой-то закон..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай нервно облизывает губы — она явно не ожидала такого ответа на свою ремарку.{/n} "Атилиус, не думаю, что Великий особо жаждет, чтобы вы подверглись лоботомии и превратились в безмозглую жестянку лишь потому, что кто-то где-то поменял какой-то закон..."

languages.text: {n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай нервно облизывает губы — она явно не ожидала такого ответа на свою ремарку.{/n} "Атилиус, не думаю, что Великий особо жаждет, чтобы вы подверглись лоботомии и превратились в безмозглую жестянку лишь потому, что кто-то где-то поменял какой-то закон..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

{n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

{n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

{n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

languages.text: {n}婕伊紧张地舔了舔嘴唇。很显然，她没想到自己的言论会得到这样的答复。{/n}“阿蒂利厄斯，我并不认为至高无上的神皇真的想看到你被切除脑叶，变成一具没有意识的行尸走肉，仅仅是由于某个地方的某个人更改了某条律法……”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊紧张地舔了舔嘴唇。很显然，她没想到自己的言论会得到这样的答复。{/n}“阿蒂利厄斯，我并不认为至高无上的神皇真的想看到你被切除脑叶，变成一具没有意识的行尸走肉，仅仅是由于某个地方的某个人更改了某条律法……”

languages.text: {n}Jae se relame, nerviosa; es evidente que no esperaba esta respuesta a su comentario.{/n} «Atilius, no creo que el Exaltado tenga ningún deseo de verle lobotomizado y convertido en una máquina sin mente solo porque alguien haya cambiado una ley...».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se relame, nerviosa; es evidente que no esperaba esta respuesta a su comentario.{/n} «Atilius, no creo que el Exaltado tenga ningún deseo de verle lobotomizado y convertido en una máquina sin mente solo porque alguien haya cambiado una ley...».

languages.text: {n}ジェイはイライラして唇をなめる。自分の発言に対してこんな返事をされるとは予想もしていなかったのが見てとれる。{/n}「アティリウス、どこかの誰かさんが法律を変えたからってだけで、アンタにロボトミー手術を施してガチャガチャ歩き回る心の無いグールに仕立てようだなんて、エグザルテッド・ワンは考えちゃいないと思うよ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはイライラして唇をなめる。自分の発言に対してこんな返事をされるとは予想もしていなかったのが見てとれる。{/n}「アティリウス、どこかの誰かさんが法律を変えたからってだけで、アンタにロボトミー手術を施してガチャガチャ歩き回る心の無いグールに仕立てようだなんて、エグザルテッド・ワンは考えちゃいないと思うよ…」

languages.text: {n}Jae leckt nervös über ihre Lippen – mit dieser Reaktion auf ihre Bemerkung hat sie offensichtlich nicht gerechnet.{/n} "Atilius, ich glaube nicht, dass der Erhabene ein gesteigertes Interesse daran hat, an Euch eine Lobotomie durchzuführen und Euch in einen hirnlosen, klappernden Ghul zu verwandeln, nur weil irgendjemand irgendwo ein Gesetz geändert hat ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae leckt nervös über ihre Lippen – mit dieser Reaktion auf ihre Bemerkung hat sie offensichtlich nicht gerechnet.{/n} "Atilius, ich glaube nicht, dass der Erhabene ein gesteigertes Interesse daran hat, an Euch eine Lobotomie durchzuführen und Euch in einen hirnlosen, klappernden Ghul zu verwandeln, nur weil irgendjemand irgendwo ein Gesetz geändert hat ..."

languages.text: {n}Jae, qui ne s'attendait pas à une telle réaction, se lèche nerveusement les lèvres.{/n} « Atilius, je ne pense pas que l'Exalté souhaite vous voir lobotomisé et transformé en goule à moitié mécanique simplement parce que quelqu'un, quelque part, a changé une loi... »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, qui ne s'attendait pas à une telle réaction, se lèche nerveusement les lèvres.{/n} « Atilius, je ne pense pas que l'Exalté souhaite vous voir lobotomisé et transformé en goule à moitié mécanique simplement parce que quelqu'un, quelque part, a changé une loi... »

languages.text: {n}Jae bu tepkiyi beklemiyormuş, öyle ki gergin bir şekilde dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "Atilius, uçsuzun öbür ucunda adamın biri mevzuat değiştirdi diye ameliyat masasına yatıp şuursuz, gıcırdayan bir ucubeye dönüşmenin beklendiğini sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nervously licks her lips — she clearly did not expect this response to her remark.{/n} "Atilius, I do not think the Exalted One has any particular desire to see you lobotomised and turned into a mindless clanking ghoul just because someone somewhere changed a law..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae bu tepkiyi beklemiyormuş, öyle ki gergin bir şekilde dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "Atilius, uçsuzun öbür ucunda adamın biri mevzuat değiştirdi diye ameliyat masasına yatıp şuursuz, gıcırdayan bir ucubeye dönüşmenin beklendiğini sanmıyorum."
